Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property and free on-site parking, 318 Express Motel Hongyuan offers comfortable guest rooms in Hongyuan, Aba. The property features an astronomical telescope for observing stars during the night time.

318 Express Motel Hongyuan is just a 5-minute drive from Hongyuan Coach Station and a 1-hour drive from Aba Hongyuan Airport.

Each guest room comes with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Extras offer a flat-screen cable TV, electric kettle and desk. For guests comfort, slippers, hairdryer and shower facilities are offered.

The staff can assist guests with car hire and ticketing service. Bicycles are available free of charge. Other services include fax/photocopying and luggage storage.

Here at 318 Express Motel Hongyuan, guests will find a restaurant serving Chinese, Cantonese, Middle East and Sichuan cuisines. Guests are required to show a valid government-issued ID card or passport upon check-in.

HotelName: Ankang Lotus Flower Yaduo Collection Hotel
Address: Northwest Corner Of The Intersection Of 316 National Road And Garden Avenue High-tech Zone725000 Ankang
Description:
Ankang Lotus Flower Yaduo Collection Hotel provides cosy, relaxing guestrooms, a library and a restaurant.  Free WiFi is provided in all areas and free private parking is available on site.

The hotel is a 13-minute drive away from Ankang History Museum and a 20-minute drive away from Xiangxi Cave. It takes around 15 minutes by taxi to Ankang Railway Station.

Wooden flooring, snowy bedding covers and traditional Chinese paintings complete the soft, calming tones of each unit. You may find a TV, a working desk and air conditioning here. The bathroom attached is fully stocked with a hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries, along with a shower stall.

Laundry and ironing services are provided here free of charge. Guests in need can make use of fax and photocopy services at no charges. There is a library as well, offering a peaceful reading space.

Countless local featured dishes are served in the on-site restaurant. Alternatively, a light meal can be enjoyed in the snack bar. Room service is availabe upon request. Guests are required to show a valid government-issued ID card or passport upon check-in.
